programme.title: Fighting Fury
programme.desc: A boy raised by his servant vows to take revenge on the ranchers who killed his parents.

programme.title: Gunsmoke Ranch
programme.desc: The Three Mesquiteers (Bob Livingston, Ray Corrigan, Max Terhune) stop a land swindler out to profit from a flood.

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: A saloon singer (Ann Dvorak) and her rival like a marshal (Randolph Scott) who cleans up a drunken sheriff's (Edgar Buchanan) cow town.

programme.title: The Dude Ranger
programme.desc: An Easterner (George O'Brien) finds rustlers and a sweetheart (Irene Hervey) on the ranch he inherited out West.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben gives farmland on the Ponderosa to an outcast Indian (Ricardo Montalban) who saved his life; guest Madlyn Rhue.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: An outlaw joins the Cartwrights' cattle drive, knowing it will take him to the town where his father is sheriff.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Attacked by Shoshones while crossing a burial ground, Adam discovers that the "Indian" woman tending him is white.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Little Joe runs into romantic complications when he tries to teach a deaf girl (Stella Stevens) sign language; guest Albert Salmi.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: An Easterner swears revenge for the death of his father, a drunk that a Cartwright killed in self-defense.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: A former dance hall girl poses as a Spanish heiress to claim a land grant that includes part of the Ponderosa; guest Sebastian Cabot.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: General store clerk Herbie Bates, is name assistant general manager of the Shady Rest by Kate, making Uncle Joe feel like he is being replaced.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe becomes a justice of the peace with hopes of attracting honeymooners.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: A Night at the Hooterville Hilton
programme.desc: A brochure for the Shady Rest Hotel of the future is prematurely distributed.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Homer plans to keep the Cannonball from making its Christmas caroling tour.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Herby Bates, who is sweet on Billie Jo, won't be seeing much more of her, he has just been drafted.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Bobbie Jo falls for Alan Landman (Dennis Hopper), a poet and beatnik.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Billie Jo discovers that her late father wanted her to be a doctor.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Kate asks the judge if she can legally keep Billie Jo from going to Hollywood.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: A movie star escapes from the Hollywood madness in Shady Rest.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe convinces two overweight women that the Shady Rest is really a reducing farm, where their loss is management's gain.

programme.title: Tumbleweeds
programme.desc: During the 1889 land rush, a cowboy is accused of staking a claim prior to the official starting time.

programme.title: Enemy of the Law
programme.desc: Former Texas Ranger Tex Haines (Tex Ritter), now an attorney, is called back into law enforcement by his old pals Dave Wyatt (Dave O'Brien) and Panhandle Perkins (Guy Wilkerson), who want his help recovering some stolen gold.

programme.title: Riders of Destiny
programme.desc: Agent Saunders (John Wayne) becomes partners with Fay (Cecelia Parker) to help her fight off a gang run by a local land grabber.

programme.title: High Lonesome
programme.desc: Texas ranchers blame a homeless drifter (John Barrymore Jr.) for two killers' dirty work.

programme.title: Adventures of Gallant Bess
programme.desc: A rodeo stunt rider (Cameron Mitchell) meets a woman (Audrey Long) who comes between him and his trick horse, Bess.

programme.title: The Devil Horse
programme.desc: After his family is wiped out by an ambush, a young boy is captured by Native Americans, and befriends a colt during his captivity.

programme.title: The Fighting Redhead
programme.desc: Red Ryder helps his old friend Dan O'Connor in his fight against Faro Savage and his gang of rustlers.
